name: Night Flare (Echonox)
description:
Scaffold Project for VGDC at UCI Fall 2018. Micheal Wong: Producer, Game Designer Joshua Agerton: Programmer Christian Segumalian: Programmer Ryan Hartanto: Programmer

Audio: Freesound.org, Newgrounds, Hanball, qubodup, LeMudCrab, LittleRobotSoun, JapanYoshiTheGamer, GameAudio, patobottos, Latzii, Djjaner

Art: Daniel Siegmund, DragonDePlatino, DawnBringer

Special thanks to VGDC for their help and support!
